812430.name: Touch the devil VR(おさわり魔王VR)
812430.description:
You can touch a sexy devil!
You can view them from anywhere with 360 degree VR, and touch them to get a variety of reactions!
Enjoy the reaction!

≪ outline ≫
By touching the devil's various places, you can enjoy a variety of reactions!
If you touch the place you want to touch, of course, you can be offended when you touch a bad place...
Please touch and see for yourself!

It is dedicated to VR.
The official correspondence is HTC Vive.

With character voice
CV: Yuzuki Tsubame
812430.supported_languages:
日语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
